article.title: CDW Receives Ruggedized Laptop Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: CDW Government Limited Liability Corporation, Vernon Hills, Illinois, was awarded an $8,293,531 firm-fixed-price contract for 875 Miltope ruggedized laptops and 100 Miltope hard drives. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
